thread.title: New york break
thread.title_full: New york break - Review of Novotel New York Times Square, New York City, NY - TripAdvisor

author: lyndap204
title: New york break
text: We recently stayed at the novotel times square, and I have to say what a lovely hotel it is, rooms were cleaned daily with towels being refreshed daily; room was comfortable and considering the closeness to times square no outside noise could be heard. Staff were extremely helpful and i would definitely stay here again.
